roleset.name: an instance of a larger set of occurrances

example.name: have_episode-l
example.text: My daughter, 22 years, just had another episode of heart palpitations which landed her in the emergency department as she was not able to stop them herself.
example.arg: which landed her in the emergency department as she was not able to stop them herself.

example.name: have_episode-l
example.text: Dr. English has had an episode of colonic obstruction
example.amr: (e / episode-01 :ARG0 (d / doctor :name (n / name :op1 "English")) :ARG1 (o / obstruct-01 :ARG1 (a / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "colon") :part-of d)))

roleset.note: EPISODE-N NOTES: Added by Julia for earthquakes.
